QuestData.Title: Two of Them, Two of Us
QuestData.Description:
A construct made entirely of kyrian flesh...
This betrays everything Maldraxxus stands for! We are meant to defend the Shadowlands and all within it, not slaughter and exploit them!
Come, $p! We end this now!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Sharrex the Fleshcrafter and First Apprentice Malkrex.
QuestData.RewardText: I sense something within this construct... something familiar...
